channel.title: Copy paste history
channel.description: Hello , im kinda new in this game , but i love it!! just want to ask , maybe you could let us copy history chat , it would be easier to make notes. for example who was accusing and who not and similar things. i think it would safe some time, thanks. i posted this in steam , developer asked me to poste it here , so here im :slight_smile:

item.description:
I think Dylan (AKA Xblade) would like this idea
